metadata.title: keycloak: Amount of attributes per object is not limited and it may lead to DOS (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A denial of service vulnerability was found in keycloak where the amount of attributes per object is not limited,an attacker by sending repeated HTTP requests could cause a resource exhaustion when the application send back rows with long attribute values. 
            
            MITIGATION: This CVE is mitigated by the 'User Profile' functionality, which was introduced in Keycloak 24. This feature introduces additional validation which prevents this vulnerability from being exploited.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
rh-sso7-keycloak-server is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
